usefulItems: rectangular baking dish (approx. 30 cm x 20 cm x 5 cm), oven
title: Christmas Baked Cod (Portugal)

ingredients.content: 15 g olive oil, plus extra for greasing
500 g floury potatoes, peeled, cut in pieces (4 cm)
800 g cod fillets, skinless, cut in pieces (4 cm)

preparations.content: Place all breadcrumb ingredients in mixing bowl and grind <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place all topping ingredients in mixing bowl and chop <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place water, potatoes and 1 pinch salt in mixing bowl then cook <b>20 min/100°C//speed <b>. Drain potatoes using simmering basket and set aside. Clean mixing bowl.
Place onions, 50 g olive oil and garlic in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Sauté <b>5 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add cod and cook <b>7 min/100°C/speed 1<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Preheat oven to 200°C and grease a large baking dish (30 cm x 20 cm).
Place reserved cooked potatoes, egg yolks, 15 g olive oil and cream in mixing bowl then mix <b>30 sec/speed 3<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside. Thoroughly clean and dry mixing bowl.
<b>Insert butterfly whisk<b>. Place reserved egg whites and 1 pinch salt in mixing bowl then whisk <b>2 min/speed 3.5<b>. <b>Remove butterfly whisk<b> and gently fold whites into reserved purée.
In prepared baking dish layer cod, mashed potatoes, breadcrumbs and olive topping. Bake for 25-30 minutes (200°C) until golden brown. Serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: In Portugal this is traditionally made with salt cod which has been soaked and then shredded before using.
